alert.note: Alert for Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 5:56AM CST until further notice by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN TRAVIS...NORTHERN BLANCO...SOUTHEASTERN LLANO AND SOUTHWESTERN BURNET COUNTIES... At 555 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Horseshoe Bay, or 7 miles north of Round Mountain, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Marble Falls, Round Mountain, Lago Vista, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Hudson Bend, Meadowlakes, Highland Haven, Spicewood, Blowout, Sandy, Oatmeal, Cypress Mill, Smithwick, Jonestown, Briarcliff, Cottonwood Shores, Sunrise Beach Village and Volente. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
